revised_title: Neurosecretory Innervation and Ultrastructure of the Eel Pituitary
tldr: This study investigates the neurosecretory innervation and ultrastructure of the pituitary in eels, specifically focusing on the neuro-intermediate lobe. The research examines the relationship between neurosecretory fibers and the cells within the pituitary, providing insights into the functional significance of these connections in teleosts.
